England: The Acts of Union 1707 were passed in the Parliament of England and Parliament of Scotland, ratifying the Treaty of Union.
The Kingdom of Great Britain came into being.
India: Death of Aurangzeb the mughal monarch.
Japan: 1707 Hōei earthquake and tsunami, followed by Hōei eruption of Mount Fuji.
Russia: Bulavin Rebellion: A small band of Don Cossacks killed a Muscovite noble searching their territory for tax fugitives.
